data.title: Who is Harry Kane’s wife and how many kids do they have? England captain married to childhood sweetheart Kate
meta_keywords: How many kids does Harry Kane have
data.meta_description: Harry Kane has a love story that not many other footballers can replicate.The England superstar is married to his childhood sweetheart, Kate, wi
data.text:
Harry Kane has a love story that not many other footballers can replicate.

The England superstar is married to his childhood sweetheart, Kate, with the couple being together since they were in school.

Follow England vs Spain LIVE HERE

Kate has been by Kane’s side throughout his incredible football career as she supported him while he became his country’s and Tottenham’s all-time top goalscorer.

Kane's move to Germany with Bayern Munich originally saw the pair live separately with Kate staying in London to look after their kids, while the forward made himself at home in a Munich hotel.

However, the family all moved into a new house in Bavaria around Christmas last year to offer him their support as his career continues to go to new heights.

As Euro 2024 is now effectively a new home tournament for Kate, she has been spotted cheering on her husband at England games and will be there for the final this Sunday.

Who is Harry Kane’s wife?

Kane and wife Kate have been married for five years after being together since their school days.

They grew up only streets away from each other when they were younger and attended the same school in east London.

The couple went on to get engaged in 2017 when Kane proposed on their holiday to the Bahamas before their wedding took place in 2019.

The striker celebrated their special day by posting on social media saying: "Finally got to marry my Best Friend! I love you."

Kate is a sports science graduate and fitness instructor who also boasts a following of over 298,000 followers on Instagram.

She is regularly at Kane’s games, showing her support on the sidelines with their children and they have all been there throughout Euro 2024 as England close in history in Germany.

However, Kate is said to find Kane’s fame ‘crazy’ now that he is considered one of the greatest strikers in football history.

Speaking about their relationship, Kane told Esquire: “We went to school together, so she's seen my whole career.

“Of course, she's finding it a little crazy. I think she's even been in the papers a couple of times taking the dogs out.”

How many kids do they have?

Kane and his wife have four kids together.

They had their first child, Ivy, in 2017 before their second daughter, Vivienne, was born a year later in 2018.

Kane and Kate then welcomed their first son, Louis, to the world in 2021.

Their fourth child, Henry, was then born in August with Kane writing on social media: "Welcome to the world Henry Edward Kane. 20/8/2023.

"Love you baby boy!"
